title: 105: Kyle Durfey: If I Don't Feel Vulnerable, I Didn’t Do My Job
itunes:title: 105: Kyle Durfey: If I Don't Feel Vulnerable, I Didn’t Do My Job
description:
This week Jeremy interviews Kyle Durfey of Pianos Become the Teeth

On this episode Kyle and Jeremy talk about the recording process for Drift, Christian hardcore, his first bands and tours, the pains of recording vocals, hearing loss, not facing the crowd, the Saltwater EP, the movie Wild Hogs, writing and recording The Lack Long After, the TA / PBTT split 7”, working with Will Yip, and so much more!

SUBSCRIBE TO THE PATREON to hear a bonus episode where Kyle answered questions that were submitted by subscribers!

Follow the show on INSTAGRAM and TWITTER

Want some First Ever Podcast merch? Click here!
